name: ux-accessibility
title: ux-accessibility
description: Assess and generate complete UI Accessibility report by taking screenshot of either whole screen or a part of the UI.
author: kushalwithk

commands.name: capture-full-screen
commands.title: Capture Full Screen
commands.subtitle: Capture entire screen behind Raycast window
commands.description: Capture full screen of the UI

commands.name: capture-area
commands.title: Capture Area
commands.subtitle: Capture specific area behind Raycast window
commands.description: Manually capture specific area of the UI

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
